Title: If We Don’t Get $1,800,000 Our Business Is Finished
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A woman whose business is in danger because of a client who filed bankruptcy 
  • A business owner wondering if hiring an accountant is the right next step 
  • Dave Ramsey’s take on Amazon’s return-to-work mandate 
  • A woman who’s considering franchising her business
